BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ASSOCIATION FOR THE PROMOTION OF APOSTOLATE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Mission is to support the evangelization done by the Roman Catholic church supporting the local bishops and abiding by the teachings and Canon Law of the Catholic Church. It promotes the evangelization of the youth of the culture promotes solidarity with the poor and promotes family life and dignity of the human person. It supports the priests and consecrated dedicated to the evangelization both in their needs of sustenance and formation and in their apostolic works. it also supports nonprofit organizations that further these goals.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Mission is to support the evangelization done by the Roman Catholic church supporting the local bishops and abiding by the teachings and Canon Law of the Catholic Church. It promotes the evangelization of the youth of the culture promotes solidarity with the poor and promotes family life and dignity of the human person. IRS990.Desc: Funds were used for the recruiting and retention of teachers

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: Funds were used for training teachers and youth as well as providing assistance with food and housing

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: Funds were used for the renovation and building of classrooms in a school in Peru

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: Funds will pay for the Young Catholic Formation Training offered by Mission Brazil.
For training teachers in spiritual accompaniment and purchase of healthy food for the school restaurant
Funds will be used to pay for training teachers in the Fides Et Ratio program in Columbia
Funds will be used for food to help de soup kitchen in Manchay and a nursing home in Callao, Peru
Funds will be used as a contribution to buy a house for a poor woman in Medellin, Colombia
Funds will be used to support a fundraiser concert by the Peruvian Symphonic Orchestra for poor children in Peru
Funds will be used to pay for training teachers in the Fides Et Ratio program in Colombia

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: The Institute for Catholic Liberal Education
